page.title: 06CLUBS STRACATHRO
page.content:
There is a{village hall}gifted by the family who once owned Stracathro House, but due to the{scattered nature {of the population, fewer functions take place there now.
The most regular user is the{local {W.R.I. which meets once a month there.The Rural numbers{about 35,}of whom 8 live in our area, the rest coming from nearer Brechin or from Brechin itself.
Other bodies which use the Parish Hall are the{School,}for parties and concerts, the{Church}for its annual money-raising function,{Brechin Young {Farmers Club}for drama rehearsals, seed and root shows and whist drives and a{C.B.Radio club.
